tool_description: Fast, up to date GraphQL API, serving latest METARs, TAFs combined with airport and runway data
name: Aviation Weather and Airport Data
title: Aviation Weather and Airport Data

api_list.name: /graphql
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aviation-weather-and-airport-data.p.rapidapi.com/graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aviation-weather-and-airport-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aviation-weather-and-airport-data.p.rapidapi.com/graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aviation-weather-and-airport-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
